scenes.text:
Act One is Cardiff’s largest drama society. Every year we put on several productions, all ranging in a variety of genres, and also host our award-winning annual night of original writing - Staging a Coup! 

If you enjoy acting, dancing, singing, socialising, or are interested in helping backstage with costumes, make-up, set design, publicity, stage management, sound or lighting, then we are the society for you!
We don't have a specific day, but specific date and times for socials we run can be found on our SU page and our social media.
Our membership is £15.00 for the year!

We have a reputation for our impressive productions, imaginative socials, and the Act One Ball!

We also run smaller-scale productions, workshops and open mic nights. So if you're a fresher and want to direct - or if you don’t get cast in a main production - there are still plenty of opportunities to get involved.
